amerikan dolar delakshayak enam rupiyal dekotiyak pamana wiyadam kota idikala mema samadhi pilimaya sandaha mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathiwaraya janadhipathi aramudalin rupiyal dasa lakshayaka mudalak parithyaga kirima da wishesha siddhiyaki.mema samadhi budu pilimaya wata shailamaya maluwak da pokunak da, ema pokuna wata, pauranika swarupaya nirupanaya karana pahan wati 12k da nirmanaya kara thibimen mema parisaraya wadath wichithrawath wi atha.
ee awuruddakata pawum dahasak bagini.
ee wenuwen me galkori kande bhagayakma kadagena yana thekda me minisun iwasa atha.
